review: Worked very well for two months, then became erratic. Eventually it was unusable.Update:  Well, I spoke to customer service (Opal) and was told a replacement would be sent.  How can you not be happy with Amazon?Second update. I received a replacement and it works very well. It's my go to for home music since my TV has surround sound. The whole transaction had only a "speed bump" and I'm pleased with the product and the purchase.

review: I LOVE my amazon fire stick!I first got one to gift to my mother for her to access movies, and then realized that i needed one for myself!Came in a perfect little box with everything needed, including batteries for the remote, which is spectacular!First had a run in problem, that i didn't think that the Fire stick itself would fit in my mother's TV HDMI port, then to find out that it comes with an extender which made a perfect fit because it is a flexible wire extender, so the only problem i had was an EASY fix. Thank goodness! My mother and i both love this.It is an easy set up, and has walk through directions once hooked up on how to use the remote!Has many streaming selection which is again another plus on this device!
